activities: RoamingAround is a mobile technology provider and our location based technologies obtain data when users interact with mobile apps.  We can collect personal data such as but not limited to: name, email, phone, gender, preference, location and others.  We user this information to provide personalized experiences that the user has requested to experience.  We ensure all users are aware of the technology and provide the ability for them to opt-out at any time.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: organization, customer, client and end-user data
